subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Baker, Nascar’s “Gentle Giant,” was the first driver to exceed 200 miles per hour on a closed course.
snippet: Baker, Nascar’s “Gentle Giant,” was the first driver to exceed 200 miles per hour on a closed course.
